quote: Don't let making a living prevent you from making a life. – John Wooden
fact: The Boston University Bridge (on Commonwealth Avenue, Boston, Massachusetts) is the only place in the world where a boat can sail under a train driving under a car driving under an airplane.
joke: Have you heard about the owl sanctuary job opening? It’s all night shifts but they’re all a hoot over there.
